Commands.Esuna: Target: Removes all debuffsParty: Grants 1.2x caster's INT BRVHigh turn rate
Commands.Cheer: Self: 5 turns Fayth's RefugeTarget: Grants BRV based on own ATK, then grants additional BRV  1.5
Commands.Grand Summon: Summons Valefor for 6 turnsTriggers Energy Blast:- 10-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + single target HP attack- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Deals 50% HP damage to other targets- Grants Valefor's Blessing for 6 turnsWhile Valefor is active:- Turns Grand Summon to Energy Blast- Turns BRV Attack to Sonic Wings- Turns HP Attack, HP Attack+ to Energy Ray- When Energy Blast is used, Valefor count is refreshed to 6 turnsValefor's Blessing has the following effects:- Raises Max BRV and Attack- Grants party BRV regenSonic Wings has the following effects:- Raises BRV based on Initial BRV- Deals a 2-HIT magic BRV+HP attackEnergy Ray has the following effects:- Raises BRV based on Attack- Deals a 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies

Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Stealth Attack: Raises BRV Damage by 5% when attacking an enemy not targeting the user.
Artifacts.Bravery Esuna: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Esuna.
Artifacts.Bravery Cheer: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Cheer.

Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%
Passives.Esuna Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Esuna
Passives.Esuna BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Esuna
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces action delay when using abilities continuously
Passives.Start Veil: Moderately raises Debuff Evasion Rate for 3 actions when the battle starts
Passives.Cheer Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Esuna
Passives.Fayth's Doctrine: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves HP value at 1
Passives.Low BRV Initial Up: Slightly raises INT BRV when BRV is below INT BRV
Passives.Esuna Extension: When using Esuna: Slightly increased BRV granted based on INT BRV Extends target's buffs by 1 turn once
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately raises MAX BRV with active buffs
Passives.Cheer Extension: Cheer use +1When using Cheer: Slight boost to Fayth's Refuge (raises INT BRV, DEF) Slightly recovers target's HP

Weapons.Ambra Rod: Turns 「BRV Attack」 to a Thunder-elemental BRV attackGrants a low probability of gaining 「Small Speed Up」 for 3 turns after using 「BRV Attack」
Weapons.Astral Rod: When using 「Esuna」:- Applies its effects to all party members
Weapons.Lullaby Rod: When using 「Cheer」:- Grants the BRV gain to all allies- Improves the effects of 「Fayth's Protection」- Grants 「Spira's Protection」 and 「Small Attack Up」 to all alliesTurns 「HP Attack」 to 「HP Attack+」 while 「Fayth's Protection」 is active「Spira's Protection」 grants BRV Regen and raises Max BRV
